label: Data & Integration Architect
title: Data & Integration Architect
description: Designs and manages data architecture, analytics infrastructure, ML platforms, and integration frameworks to enable data-driven decision making across the enterprise.
responsibilities: Design data architecture and analytics platforms
Manage ML/AI platform and model lifecycle
Oversee data integration and API strategy
Drive data literacy and analytics adoption
traditionalWorkflow: Manual data pipeline development and maintenance
Batch data processing with nightly updates
agenticWorkflow: Automated data pipelines with real-time processing
Unified analytics platform with self-service access
Streaming data infrastructure for real-time insights
MLOps platform for automated model lifecycle
painPointsAddressed: Manual pipelines don't scale with data growth
Manual ML operations limit model velocity
Centralized team can't meet business demand
